description: John-Kymani Gordon's winner helps in-form Colchester extend their unbeaten run to 10 League Two matches with victory over Chesterfield.
title: Colchester United 1-0 Chesterfield
title_page: League Two: Colchester United 1-0 Chesterfield - BBC Sport
maintext:
Each of the last five Football League meetings between Colchester United and Chesterfield have finished level, with the pair playing out a 1-1 stalemate in the reverse fixture in October.
Chesterfield have failed to win any of their last three away Football League games against Colchester United (D2 L1), last enduring a longer such run between September 1980 and September 1992 (five games).
Colchester have only lost one of their last nine home games in League Two (W4 D4), a 0-2 defeat by Accrington Stanley in January.
Chesterfield have lost five of their last six away league games (D1), including each of their last three in row. The Spireites last suffered four straight away defeats in League Two in January 2018.
